com.sensorstack.devicelayer

Class DeviceLayerActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.sensorstack.devicelayer.DeviceLayerActivity

  • public class DeviceLayerActivity
extends Activity
    This class is used for connection establishment of android device with the sensor hardware depending on the mode of connectivity. In the current version, Bluetooth connectivity is supported.
